amendment.description: To prohibit funding for Operation Fast and Furious or similar "gun walking" programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 775 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 0. Record Vote Number: 167.

action.text: Amendment SA 775 proposed by Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 738. (consideration: CR S6587-6590; text: CR S6587) To prohibit funding for Operation Fast and Furious or similar "gun walking" programs.
